verses.verse: Furthermore <S%G3063><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> we beseech <S%G2065><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> and exhort <S%G3870><s%> you by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that as you have <S%G2192><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> of us how <S%G4459><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%> and to please <S%G700><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> so you would abound <S%G4052><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> and more. <S%G3123><s%>
For you know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> commandments <S%G3852><s%> we gave <S%G1325><s%> you by the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
For this <S%G5124><s%> is the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> even your <S%G5216><s%> sanctification, <S%G38><s%> that you should abstain <S%G567><s%> from fornication: <S%G4202><s%>
That every <S%G1538><s%> one of you should know <S%G1492><s%> how to possess <S%G2932><s%> his vessel <S%G4632><s%> in sanctification <S%G38><s%> and honor; <S%G5092><s%>
Not in the lust <S%G3806><s%> of concupiscence, <S%G1939><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> not God: <S%G2316><s%>

That no <S%G3361><s%> man go <S%G5233><s%> beyond <S%G5233><s%> and defraud <S%G4122><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> in any matter: <S%G4229><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is the avenger <S%G1558><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> such, <S%G5130><s%> as we also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> forewarned <S%G4277><s%> you and testified. <S%G1263><s%>
For God <S%G2316><s%> has not called <S%G2564><s%> us to uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> but to holiness. <S%G38><s%>

He therefore <S%G5105><s%> that despises, <S%G114><s%> despises <S%G114><s%> not man, <S%G444><s%> but God, <S%G2316><s%> who has also <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to us his holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

But as touching <S%G4012><s%> brotherly <S%G5360><s%> love <S%G5360><s%> you need <S%G5532><s%> not that I write <S%G1125><s%> to you: for you yourselves <S%G846><s%> are taught <S%G2312><s%> of God <S%G2312><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

And indeed <S%G1063><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> it toward <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in all <S%G3650><s%> Macedonia: <S%G3109><s%> but we beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> that you increase <S%G4052><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> and more; <S%G3123><s%>

And that you study <S%G5389><s%> to be quiet, <S%G2270><s%> and to do <S%G4238><s%> your <S%G2398><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> business, <S%G2398><s%> and to work <S%G2038><s%> with your <S%G2398><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> hands, <S%G5495><s%> as we commanded <S%G3853><s%> you;
That you may walk <S%G4043><s%> honestly <S%G2156><s%> toward <S%G4314><s%> them that are without, <S%G1854><s%> and that you may have <S%G2192><s%> lack <S%G5532><s%> of nothing. <S%G3367><s%>

But I would <S%G2309><s%> not have you to be ignorant, <S%G50><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> them which are asleep, <S%G2837><s%> that you sorrow <S%G3076><s%> not, even <S%G2532><s%> as others <S%G3062><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope. <S%G1680><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> we believe <S%G4100><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> died <S%G599><s%> and rose <S%G450><s%> again, <S%G450><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> them also <S%G2532><s%> which sleep <S%G2837><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> will God <S%G2316><s%> bring <S%G71><s%> with him.

For this <S%G5124><s%> we say <S%G3004><s%> to you by the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that we which <S%G3588><s%> are alive <S%G2198><s%> and remain <S%G4035><s%> to the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall not precede <S%G5348><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> are asleep. <S%G2837><s%>

For the Lord <S%G2962><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> shall descend <S%G2597><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> with a shout, <S%G2752><s%> with the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the archangel, <S%G743><s%> and with the trump <S%G4536><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and the dead <S%G3498><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> shall rise <S%G450><s%> first: <S%G4412><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> we which <S%G3588><s%> are alive <S%G2198><s%> and remain <S%G4035><s%> shall be caught <S%G726><s%> up together <S%G260><s%> with them in the clouds, <S%G3507><s%> to meet <S%G529><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> in the air: <S%G109><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> shall we ever <S%G3842><s%> be with the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Why <S%G5620><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with these <S%G5125><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>
